data.meta_description: May 7, 2016 - 1st Wife Marie-Maria Alexandrovna (Maximilienne Wilhelmine Marie) (8 Aug 1824-3 Jun 1880) Hesse, Germany of Tsar Alexander II “Sasha” Nikolaevich Romanov (29 Apr 1818-13 Mar 1881). They had 8 children. She was the Child of King Louis II (Ludwig II) (1777-1848) Hesse, Germany & Princess Wilhelmine (1788-1836) Baden, Germany. Records show Marie’s father was August Ludwig von Senarclens de Grancy (1794-1871), her mother's lover. Louis II claimed her as his legal child. See more ideas about romanov, hesse, maria.
